alert.note: Alert for Washington (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 12:03PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota and Wisconsin... Mississippi River near Hastings L/D 2 (COE) affecting Dakota, Goodhue, Washington and Pierce Counties. St Croix River at Stillwater affecting Pierce, St. Croix and Washington Counties. .The combination of upstream snowmelt and rainfall over the weekend will continue to cause rising rivers for at least the next week. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Croix River at Stillwater. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, HWY 95 between Afton and Bayport begins to flood. Lakefront Park bathhouse in Hudson affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1100 AM CDT Friday, the stage was 84.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 89.9 feet toward the middle of next week. - Flood stage is 87.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 89.7 feet on 04/14/1952. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
